nodes.text: Fort Dandunc was an estate used by the Qunaalac Hutt kajidic on the planet Kor Qunaalac during the time of the Galactic Civil War. The fort was one of the planet's most well known residences and was sited next to an artificial lake, on top of a round hill. The fort had significant ground and air defences and housed Qunaalac treasures and war trophies.
